name: Smart Survey
tag_list: online, surveys, questionnaires, polls, research, market, dissertation, tool, software, customer, employee, satisfaction
overview:
Smart Survey is the UK’s leading online survey software.

Smart Survey is designed to help users create professional surveys, publish them online and collect graphical results in real time.

Create surveys from scratch, or choose from one of our ready made survey templates. A wide range of questions types will allow you to build the perfect survey for your research. Represent your company or business by creating custom survey themes and adding logos.

Distribute your surveys using different distribution methods. Send by email, mailing lists, integrate to social networks, embed your survey to websites and more.

View your survey results as the come in and perform in depth analysis using the selection of reporting features. View an overall summary, view individual responses, create charts and graphs, export results to Word and Excel, filter your results and more.

All data is stored securely within our UK based servers and daily penetration tests are carried out to prevent vulnerabilities.
